Es un clásico de Valve, un experimento que salió bien y marco las bases para una futura secuela. Podes aprovechar y comprarlo en alguna rebaja y veras que vas a pasar unas buenas horas explorando los laboratorios de Aperture Science y las mecánicas que el juego tiene para ofrecer.

A friend recommended to me a while ago to play Portal, I neglected to take his advice straight away as I didn't think the game would be "for me." However during the Steam summer sale event I decided to pick up both Portal games for around $1.50 (A steal) and I was amazed! I played Portal non-stop for an entire afternoon! The story was original and engaging and the game play is epic! I would highly recommend you pick this game up if you have the funds (And if it's on sale.)
To date, one of the best games I've ever played.

To chyba przedostatnia dobra gra od valve bez multi. Oczywiście jest to krótka produkcja, ale to ze względu na to że twórcy postawili na jakość, a nie na ilość jak wielu twórców w dzisiejszych czasach.

Fan-bloody-tastic!! I played the crap out of portal 2 when it first released on ps3 but had never played the first one and I recently got the chance too. My only gripe is that is too short. Some of the bonus rooms are brutal as are some of the timed rooms but still pretty fun.
Finally played the first one after owning Portal 2 for years, a short but fun jaunt! And I got it for only 73 cents baby.

old but gold

Qué decir de este juegazo que no se ha dicho nada, es corto pero increíble. Su sistema es simple pero innovador y super divertido, haciendo que cada puzzle sea completamente diferente y con compañía de unos personajes carismáticos a los que con pocas horas he cogido mucho cariño. Ahora en las ofertas por menos de 1 euro cada uno de los Portal es una compra obligada
Juegazo!! No pensé que estuviera tan entretenido, totalmente recomendable

A campanha é meio curta, mas ainda é a melhor série de jogos da Valve disparado. Se você for atrás de toda a lore vai ver que é quase tão densa quanto HL, mas de uma forma mais divertida, tanto o primeiro quanto o segundo são obras primas
Highly recommend if its on sale. short but sweet.

Finally got around to buying and playing this game, and it surprised me a lot. The game can be pretty challenging but not unfair. The game gets pretty dark out of nowhere (and I love it). The source engine might have aged a bit but the graphics still look presentable. Overall, a pretty good game and I can't wait to play Portal 2

If you're one of the few people left who hasn't played this game - just do it. Creative concept that doesn't overstay it's welcome, with more than a couple surprises.
